title: Nexus Siege/Elementalist Lux
body: So recently I played Nexus Siege, really interesting, as lux with the new elementalist lux skin. I started on defense and began with nature, I could not get to the final form before time ended. However, when I was on offense and the skin was set back to light,  I was able to select nature as the new element. I figured that this was a problem.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're currently looking into what's going on here. :)
